title: Short-Intensive Instructional Design Course Utilizing AI-Based Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Core social studies knowledge and digital device application capabilities
context.additional_context: A mobile-based learning process for current practitioners to apply AI-driven learning analytics tools at each stage of the ADDIE model

learning_goals: Explain the five phases of the ADDIE model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) in conjunction with AI-driven learning analytics
Collect and interpret learner behavior data using AI analytics tools in mobile environments
Propose curriculum improvement plans based on AI analysis results during the evaluation phase
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
